Text.Page:
The mekonari are raising an army in the Nightwood. Get in there and bust them up!

We sighted {@LinkCreature:56#11#runekeeper deceivers}, {@LinkCreature:56#13#spectral legates}, {@LinkCreature:56#15#mekonari occultists}, {@LinkCreature:56#57#hunters}, and {@LinkCreature:56#58#ebonweavers}.

Report to Kaara at Blackspring Camp when your mission is complete.

I guess birds of a feather shouldn't flock together!

Sorry. Not really the time or place, is it?
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
